Relocation Tip.name: Relocation Tip
Relocation Tip.Content:
Narrator: So, you want to relocate your city? Great move—but don’t do it blindly!
✅ First, make sure ALL your troops and heroes are back in the city.
✅ Next, check your ETC inventory for teleport items:
- Territorial City Relocation (Blue): Moves you inside alliance territory
- City Relocation (Purple): Lets you move to a specific spot on the map
- Random City Relocation (Green): Teleports you to a random location
Relocation Tip.Pro Tip:
If you’ve just joined an alliance, you’ll want to move close to your Alliance Leader. Here's how:
- Tap the Alliance button
- Go to the Main Tab
- Tap the golden drop icon on the top left
- Find your leader's city and look for a nearby green space
- Use a Territorial Relocation to settle in
📌 Being near your alliance is key for rallying against barbarians, strongholds, and enemy gates. Teamwork is power!

Rally Tip.name: Rally Tip
Rally Tip.Content:
Rallies are a BIG part of team play—and scoring big rewards. Here's how to get in on the action:
Pick your target – fortress, gate, or stronghold
Tap it and select Rally
Set a prep time to give teammates a chance to join
Build your troop—use your strongest benders!
Hit March, and boom—you’ve started the rally!
If no one from your alliance joins the rally, it will be cancelled and you'll get your AP back.
🎺 To keep track, tap the trumpet icon in the bottom-right corner. From there, you can monitor who’s joined and how much time is left before the attack begins.

Stay Active Tip.name: Stay Active Tip
Stay Active Tip.Content:
Time for a Pro-Player TIP #1 from Marshmallow

🔧 Don't let anything sit idle!

Keep your builders 👷, research lab 🧪, and tunnel 🚇 constantly working to maintain your growth 📈.

Always send out gatherers 🌾 (unless you're in the middle of a war ⚔️), as well as expeditions 🌍 and airships ✈️.

Plan ahead so nothing goes unused.

Hard work always pays off! 💪💥
